definition: interim/midterm
variant of 期[qi1]/period/cycle
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
within/among/in/middle/center/while (doing sth)/during/(dialect) OK/all right
China/Chinese/surname Zhong
mid-term exam

sentences.english: Make sure you all have done that by the midterm.
It means a lot more when you do your mid-term, you're worried about the errors.
sentences.chinese: 在你期中考试的时候，你担心出错。

sentences.english: All of my mid-terms tended to be during one week
sentences.chinese: 我所有的期中考试都安排在了同一个星期。

sentences.english: Sample midterm exams and answers are provided here.
Mid-term examination will arrive at soon , I am able to make great efforts to finish getting achievement.
sentences.chinese: 期中考试快到了，我会努力取得好成绩。

sentences.english: Today was the last day before Half-term holiday.
sentences.chinese: 今天是期中假期之前的最后一天。

sentences.english: She must rub up her English for the midterm examination.
sentences.chinese: 她必须复习一下英语以便应付期中测验。

sentences.english: The mid-term exams have finished, in which case we can plan for an outgoing.
sentences.chinese: 既然期中考试已经结束，那我们可以考虑出去郊游了。

sentences.english: The mid-semester exams are finally over!
sentences.chinese: 期中考的折磨终于给我熬过了。

sentences.english: We have just concluded a three-day examination period.
sentences.chinese: 我们刚刚结束了为期三天的期中考试。

sentences.english: Are you worried about passing the midterm exam, or do you feel secure.
sentences.chinese: 你在担心怎么通过期中考试还是你根本就很放心？

sentences.english: I'm great. Have you finished your midterm exams ?
sentences.chinese: 我也很好，你考完所有的期中考试了么？

sentences.english: Two hours were allowed for the final examination.
sentences.chinese: 期中考试限两小时交卷。

sentences.english: My thesis is due the same week as midterms.
sentences.chinese: 结业论文停止的日期，跟期中测验那一周反复。

sentences.english: We'll have mid-term exams next week.
sentences.chinese: 我们下周要进行期中考试。
